tool_description: Get endless interesting facts. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/facts.
title: Facts by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/facts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facts-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com/v1/facts"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facts-by-api-ninjas.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **1**.
